author: ate
msg: JS2-1251: provide better control and logging feedback from DefaultJetspeedSecuritySynchronizer:
- additional synchronizer logger to allow logging to dedicated synchronizer logfile
- support for continue or abort on synchronization errors
- synchronizing feedback after configurable batch chunk size
- allow setting synchronizing state from extended implementations

author: ate
msg: JS2-1251: provide access to inner (static) ManagedListByQueryCallback class to allow reuse by an extended JetspeedSecurityPersistenceManager implementation

author: ate
msg: JS2-1251: Also support Ldap Entity loading based on a Spring LdapTemplate provided DirContextAdapter

author: mahadev
msg: Fix assembly to add mapreduce shell scripts to the assembly package. (mahadev)
